name: Spring The Monkey
description:
A  game made for the ScoreSpace Jam #19! https://itch.io/jam/scorejam19

Play as Spring, an energetic monkey who loves to show off his insane parkour moves! Parkour through the city with cool flips and jumps!

(level, design, coding, music)
